synopsis.text: Jurai's arch-nemesis and intergalactic convict, Kain, has orchestrated a daring escape from prison, leaving the Galaxy Police headquarters in ruins. To prevent the Jurai from thwarting his plans, Kain travels back in time to 1970, aiming to eliminate Tenchi Masaki's mother before he is even born. As Tenchi and his friends watch in horror, their home and even Tenchi himself start to vanish. To save Tenchi's existence and preserve the future, the group must embark on a thrilling journey back in time to protect Tenchi's parents from Kain's sinister clutches. Prepare for a captivating adventure in 'Tenchi Muyo in Love', where the fate of time and space hangs in the balance.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
